/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional blue and green accents that add a touch of color to the urban landscape. 

The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalks, adding a human element to the scene. 

The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, providing a serene backdrop to the busy street below. The image is bathed in the bright sunlight of the day, casting sharp shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
